title: Will Boris Johnson Hit The Reset Button?
itunes:title: Will Boris Johnson Hit The Reset Button?
description:
How will the prime minister pursue his "levelling up" agenda amid forecasts of the worst recession in 300 years? Our senior executive editor David Merritt talks Bloomberg Westminster's Roger Hearing and Sebastian Salek through the options.

Plus, the threat of no deal is back. British and EU negotiators head into the last round of talks before a key summit. Brexit Editor Edward Evans joins to discuss.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
